title: The 2021 NBA Over/Under Mega Preview With Ryen Russillo and Joe House
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo and Joe House on the eve of the 2020-21 NBA season for the annual NBA over/unders podcast. They make their picks for win totals in both the Eastern (2:00) and Western conferences (1:30:00), MVP, rookie of the year, most-improved candidates, and more! (2:52:00)
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
